duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and coach the sales team to provide inspirational, authentic, and personalized customer service to meet sales and customer service targets.
Carry out start and end of day cash reconciliation and have responsibility for opening and closing the store on a rotational basis.
Utilize flair for retail to ensure smooth and efficient running of the store.

education_certification.credential: Proven retail experience, preferably within cosmetics.
Previous supervisory experience including coaching/mentoring others to achieve sales and customer service targets is desirable.
Ability to work retail hours including days, nights, weekends and special events in a fast-paced work environment.
